items.title: 50 Treasure Tokens
items.description: Use Treasure Tokens to open Bounties that contain Star Content, tacticians, arenas, and more!

items.title: 520 Star Shards + 55 Bonus Star Shards
items.description: Use these Star Shards to star up your Little Legends! All Star Shards and their upgrade uses are non-refundable.

items.title: 1040 Star Shards + 160 Bonus Star Shards
items.description: Use these Star Shards to star up your Little Legends! All Star Shards and their upgrade uses are non-refundable.

items.title: 130 Star Shards
items.description: Use these Star Shards to star up your Little Legends! All Star Shards and their upgrade uses are non-refundable.

items.title: Boba Bundle
items.description: Includes Boba Sprite and “Boba Blast” booms.

items.title: Batch of Barons
items.description: Includes Exclusive Monsters Attack Baron variants and Baron 'Smiteback!' boom.

items.title: Chibi Janna Pass Bundle
items.description: Includes Chibi Janna, “Howling Gale” boom, ”Storm's Coming!!!” emote, and the Cyber City: Phase 1 Pass+.

items.title: Cyber City Starter Bundle
items.description: Includes Pulsefire Knife Pup Tier 1, 200 Star Shards, and “Jolly and Jaded” emote.

items.title: Chibi Riven Pass Bundle
items.description: This bundle includes TFT Cyber City Phase 1 Pass+, Chibi Riven, Blade of the Exile Boom, and the Come at Me Emote
